description: The Principe di Belludia is the gourmet restaurant at the Il San Corrado di Noto hotel, a luxurious resort in a secluded rural location with two enormous swimming pools. The new executive chef Martin Lazarov showcases his love for Sicily, with a particular attention to vegetables dishes.
